attributes.action: To stop tattooist/piercing's in private places to be illegal to under 18's
attributes.background: To make it illegal for tattooist's an piercers to do either tattoo or pierce intimate areas unless there 18+

rejection.details:
It's already an offence to give someone who is under 18 a tattoo. We're therefore not sure what further action you'd like the Government and Parliament to take. 

You can view the Tattooing of Minors Act 1969 here: http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1969/24 

It isn't  illegal to give a piercing to an under 18 year old. You could start a new petition asking for the Government and Parliament to make it illegal, if that's what you want to happen.
